Class AdvanceKeyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.ds.AdvanceCreateModifyInfo

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<AdvanceKeyStore>, HasPassword, Identifiable<java.lang.String>, XSerializable

    public class AdvanceKeyStore
extends AdvanceCreateModifyInfo
implements XSerializable, HasPassword, Copyable<AdvanceKeyStore>, Identifiable<java.lang.String>
    A record representing information about local or remote key stores.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.09.20.
